startingPosition.instruction: Lie flat on the back. Legs together and straight. Arms by the sides and palms down. Head, neck and spine in a straight line.

technique.instruction: Bend both the knees bringing both the thighs to the chest and interlocking the fingers hold the shins just below the knees.
Exhaling roll the body to the right and touch the side of the legs on the floor.
Exhaling roll the body to the left and touch the side of the legs on the floor.
Inhaling return to the center and that is step 2.
Sit in the squating position with the buttocks just above the floor and interlocking the fingers hold the shins just below the knees.
Inhaling rock the whole body backwards on the spine.
Exhaling rock the whole body forward and return to step 1.

info: Deep breathing should be done and movement should be in sync with the breathing.
Gently push out the abdomen with inhalation and exhaling return to the starting position. Repeat 5 times.
